Reviews.Title: My second of these.
Reviews.Author: Wendy Kain
Reviews.Content: Fantastic.  I love these, I think the best laptops I have ever had (and I have had many!).  Wholeheartedly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Review not on product; but the Seller
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: I received the shipment today.  And I think I got a Lemon worth $1150.  Computer Upgrade King claimed it to be "new".  Not sure what it means but the top of the box is retaped and the contents inside are all lose.  I did not even want to attempt opening it. It is going back to amazon fulfillment center.  I am quite disappointed with this buying experience.  I even bought an mSATA SSD and RAM memory to upgrade the laptop and now I have to return them as well.  When i asked Amazon rep if they check whether a unit is new or not before they ship, she confirmed that for products sold by tird parties and fulfilled by amazon, they don't check if that is the case.  Thus, BUYER BEWARE.  This kind of purchase experience leaves a sour taste about buying things from third parties on amazon esp. if amazon fulfills it as no one is checking or guaranteeing that you are getting what you ordered.

Reviews.Title: Deffective
Reviews.Author: PAUL M
Reviews.Content: My first Lenovo was a ThinkPad T60. Since than, the build quality is going down with each generation. I've chosen T530 instead of T540p because of the simpler keyboard and because I love the 5 button Thinknav design, which T540 lacks.But this came with a defective trackpad, so only one star this time.

Reviews.Title: OK but heavy
Reviews.Author: golden55
Reviews.Content: Feels much heavier than expected but I like the fact that it has all the accessories required built-in.  Also slower than anticipated
